Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Leclaire
ShortDescription: WB 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Cicero, Montrose, Milwaukee and into Jefferson Park: due to, street blockage near Foster/Leclaire.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 79th/Halsted
ShortDescription: EB 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 81st, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted, 81st, Vincennes, & 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Northbound Reroute near 79th/Halsted
ShortDescription: NB 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Terminal, Emerald, 81st, & Vincennes, due to street blockage near 79th/Halsted.

Headline: #X9 Ashland Express and #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/42nd
ShortDescription: X9 Ashland Exp & 9 Ashland buses are rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Pershing, Halsted, 47th and Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/42nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my route?

#X9 Ashland Express and #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, Pershing, Halsted, 47th, then resume their normal route on Ashland due to police activity near Ashland/42nd.   

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Forest Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
